thread.section_title: American RV Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American RV Company | www.americanrvcompany.com
thread.title: Theresa Ruddell
thread.title_full: American RV Company reviewed by Theresa Ruddell

author: Theresa Ruddell
title: Theresa Ruddell
text: We had a water problem & ordered a needed part paying for 2 day delivery unaware that the part was not kept in inventory. We called to check on delivery & found it would take up to 3-4 days for them to get the part. I explained our situation & was told they would see what they could do for us. Although it took longer than the 2 days we thought we would receive the part in, we received it in 3 days. We were very pleased & would definitely do business with American RV again.
